channel.title: Patrick Adams Podcast
channel.description: Legendary Platinum Producer, Songwriter Patrick Adams interviews out of the mainstream Dance and R&B artist while playing their music.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Give it a listen!
channel.itunes:author: patrick adams
channel.itunes:summary: Legendary Platinum Producer, Songwriter Patrick Adams interviews out of the mainstream Dance and R&B artist while playing their music.

item.title: BULLSH*T & STARDUMB
item.description: Patrick Adams presents 2 bolg readings. First, general observations about the business communityies use of BS. Second, thoughts about what it takes to become a success im todays music business. Patrick Adams is a veteren record producer, arranger, musician and songwriter with multiple Platinum and Gold record awards.
item.dc:creator: patrick adams
item.itunes:summary: Patrick Adams presents 2 bolg readings. First, general observations about the business communityies use of BS. Second, thoughts about what it takes to become a success im todays music business. Patrick Adams is a veteren record producer, arranger, musician and songwriter with multiple Platinum and Gold record awards.

item.title: Patrick Adams Orchestra Preview
item.description: Patrick Adams previews music from new Patrick Adams orchestra CD.
item.dc:creator: patrick adams
item.itunes:summary: Patrick Adams previews music from new Patrick Adams orchestra CD.

item.title: Soul For Lovers Only & It's The American Way
item.description: Patrick Adams previews music for Silky James Taylor CD - "SOUL FOR LOVERS ONLY." In the blog segment Patrick Adams talks about the upcoming "Death Of Hip-Hop" - It's the American Way!
item.dc:creator: patrick adams
item.itunes:summary: Patrick Adams previews music for Silky James Taylor CD - "SOUL FOR LOVERS ONLY." In the blog segment Patrick Adams talks about the upcoming "Death Of Hip-Hop" - It's the American Way!

item.title: LAPTOP DANCER DREAM STRIPPER BY CLOUD ONE
item.description: Patrick Adams again interviews Ms Chocolate Chip the voice of Cloud One on the new dance hit "LAPTOP DANCER" Music includes "LAPTOP DANCER" & "LIQUOR DeSPLIT"; In the Blog segment : Is Barak Obama black enough?
item.dc:creator: patrick adams
item.itunes:summary: Patrick Adams again interviews Ms Chocolate Chip the voice of Cloud One on the new dance hit "LAPTOP DANCER" Music includes "LAPTOP DANCER" & "LIQUOR DeSPLIT"; In the Blog segment : Is Barak Obama black enough?

item.title: Entertainment & In The Bush
item.description: Patrick Adams talks about what it means to be an entertainer and the importance of learning your craft before wearing a title. Patrick then gives us incite into the creation of the Disco hit song "PUSH PUSH IN THE BUSH." The original recording by the female group MUSIQUE was banned from airplay in 1979 by 600 radio stations. US magazine in their January 9, 1979 issue said thet Patrick Adams was the Push behind Discos "Launch into Raunch."
item.dc:creator: patrick adams
item.itunes:summary: Patrick Adams talks about what it means to be an entertainer and the importance of learning your craft before wearing a title. Patrick then gives us incite into the creation of the Disco hit song "PUSH PUSH IN THE BUSH." The original recording by the female group MUSIQUE was banned from airplay in 1979 by 600 radio stations. US magazine in their January 9, 1979 issue said thet Patrick Adams was the Push behind Discos "Launch into Raunch."

item.title: Appreciate The Love
item.description: Patrick Adams interviews singer songwriter Searena Mari about her CD "THUG LOVE." Serena Mari is an independent Artist with a very unique and independent style. From the Patrick Adams Blog - "The Best Part Of Waking UP!"
item.dc:creator: patrick adams
item.itunes:summary: Patrick Adams interviews singer songwriter Searena Mari about her CD "THUG LOVE." Serena Mari is an independent Artist with a very unique and independent style. From the Patrick Adams Blog - "The Best Part Of Waking UP!"

item.title: Out "A" Order
item.description: Patrick Adams interview Evie Rhodes. Under the name Prophecy 1 Ms Rhodes received the Canadian award for "Best Gospel Album." She has since turned her creative talents to writing supernatural suspence novels.. Her third novel - OUT "A" ORDER is released this week to rave reviews. Ms. Rhodes has been called a true Renaissance Woman. She is published by Kensington/Dafina Books. Her prvious works are "EXPIRED" and "CRISS CROSS"
item.dc:creator: patrick adams
item.itunes:summary: Patrick Adams interview Evie Rhodes. Under the name Prophecy 1 Ms Rhodes received the Canadian award for "Best Gospel Album." Ms. Rhodes has been called a true Renaissance Woman. She is published by Kensington/Dafina Books. Her prvious works are "EXPIRED" and "CRISS CROSS"

item.title: Rising Stars
item.description: Patrick Adams features music from two rising Caribbean stars - Ray Smith the percussionist known as The Bahamas Man. Ray currently lives in Washington DC. Songs include: Dance And Shake, The Bahamas Song, I Want To Know and Rock Your Boom Boom. Tony Terrell is a virtuoso on the Steel Drums. His sweet approach and arrangements make his Caribbean Jazz Quartet a "must see and hear." Songs include Smooth Operator, Through the Fire and Back At One.
item.dc:creator: patrick adams
item.itunes:summary: Patrick Adams features music from two rising Caribbean stars - Ray Smith the percussionist known as The Bahamas Man. Ray currently lives in Washington DC. Songs include: Dance And Shake, The Bahamas Song, I Want To Know and Rock Your Boom Boom. Tony Terrell is a virtuoso on the Steel Drums. His sweet approach and arrangements make his Caribbean Jazz Quartet a "must see and hear." Songs include Smooth Operator, Through the Fire and Back At One.

item.title: The Dream
item.description: Patrick Adams talks about America as seen through the eyes of a young black man. In this podcast Patrick tells shorts stories of his personal experiences through the years.as a travelling musician and some of the changes he has seen:
item.dc:creator: patrick adams
item.itunes:summary: Patrick Adams talks about America as seen through the eyes of a young black man. In this podcast Patrick tells shorts stories of his personal experiences through the years.as a travelling musician and some of the changes he has seen:

item.title: TYRONE THOMAS
item.description: Patrick Adams previews "NOW" a CD by soulful baritone vocalist Tyrone Thomas. Tyrone who started out as a drummer for Patti Labelle wrote one of the most sampled records in the history of hip-hop music-"SEVEN MINUTES OF FUNK" by the Whole Darn Family. On his current CD Tyrone has a style reminicent of the great Barry White with full orchestrations and funky beats.
item.dc:creator: patrick adams
item.itunes:summary: Patrick Adams previews "NOW" a CD by soulful baritone vocalist Tyrone Thomas. Tyrone who started out as a drummer for Patti Labelle wrote one of the most sampled records in the history of hip-hop music-"SEVEN MINUTES OF FUNK" by the Whole Darn Family. On his current CD Tyrone has a style reminicent of the great Barry White with full orchestrations and funky beats.

item.title: RANDOM THOUGHTS DECEMBER 2006
item.description: Patrick Adams gives his random thought on "No School" music. the late James Brown, the late Tony Silvester of the Main Ingredient and more in select readings from his Myspace Blog.
item.dc:creator: patrick adams
item.itunes:summary: Patrick Adams gives his random thought on "No School" music. the late James Brown, the late Tony Silvester of the Main Ingredient and more in select readings from his Myspace Blog.

item.title: Total Soul of Terry King
item.description: Terry King a former member of The Drifters is interviewed by Silky James our roving reporter. He talks about his career; past , present and future - Another piece of music history.
item.dc:creator: patrick adams
item.itunes:summary: Terry King a former member of The Drifters is interviewed by Silky James our roving reporter. He talks about his career; past , present and future - Another piece of music history.

item.title: "FIND NO TIME FOR SADNESS" - INTERVIEW WITH CASANOVA CORTEZ (PART 1)
item.description: Patrick Adams interviews Casanova Cortez, CEO and founder of New R&B Records 2000. Mr Cortez discusses the evolution of his "America's Anthem 911" dedicated to the lost New York Policemen, Fire- fighters and their families.
item.dc:creator: patrick adams
item.itunes:summary: Patrick Adams interviews Casanova Cortez, CEO and founder of New R&B Records 2000. Mr Cortez discusses the evolution of his "America's Anthem 911" dedicated to the lost New York Policemen, Fire- fighters and their families.

item.title: "Masterbate Me" interveiw with Ms Computer Chip
item.description: Patrick Adams interviews Ms Computer Chip the featured artist on the Cloud One - Club/Dance recording, "Masterbate Me." Includes several minutes of the song in the background.
item.dc:creator: patrick adams
item.itunes:summary: Patrick Adams interviews Ms Computer Chip the featured artist on the Cloud One - Club/Dance recording, "Masterbate Me." Includes several minutes of the song in the background.

item.title: Silky James Taylor Interview
item.description: Patrick Adams interviews R&B vocalist "Silky" James Taylor. Mr Taylor was lead tenor vocalist of the Helen William Platters in the 1990s. During the interview several songs from his new CD - "For Lovers Only" are played in the background. Silky Jame Taylor's website: http://Isound.com/jimmy_taylor_and_opia_myst
